article:
We see many animals, like rabbits, bees, dogs, birds, sheep...,but do you know _ these animals say things? First,let's see a rabbit. When a rabbit sees _ dangerous ,it runs away at once. When it runs, its tail moves up and _ .When others see this, they run away, _ .
Many other animals use this kind of language . When a bee has found some food,  it goes back to _ home. It cannot tell the other bees where the food is by speaking to them,but it does a little dance in the air. This may tell other bees _ the food is.
Some animals say things by _ sounds like a man does. For example,a dog barks when a stranger comes near. Some birds can make several _ sounds,  each with its own meaning. In a word, every animal has its own language.
